Feedback

# General

Done - Elektra Light Pro rendering doesn't look right with font-weight:bolder;. You need to either, just use the light version of the font throughout the page or also include the bold version of the font.
Change the <strong> css to --> font-weight: lighter; And use a large text-size instead.

# Mobile/Tablet Rendering

Please check tablet rendering on iPad, and your other mobile devices. I have found a number of issues:

- Parallax effect seems to have very poor performance on mobile devices, even high powered ones like my Galaxy Note 2.
- Consider removing parallax effect for mobile devices.  Media queries is the easiest way, also consider targeting through the user agent string.   
- Index2 has a large right margin problem.
- The hero images also seem to get clipped on the side. it looks like margin 20px is added to the body. 


# Header Bar

Done - Login and Sign Up modal forms not appearing. 
Done - Logo: Change back to original.
DONE - Javascript slider for "how it works, free customs data, product browser" not functioning.
Using jQuery.scrollto.js for the anchor scroll.

# Hero Slider

Done - index2.html does not need the hero image slider.
NOT DONE - Can I see what the hero sliders would look like with a background image width at 1920px? It's currently at 1532px. If it won't work can you at least get it to 1680px.
This need a large background image match 1920px. Also For all the slider background need better images.
For slide #3, need to seperate the guy out of the background.
DONE - Also for the Hero Slider section set the background colour to the very dark blue #252531. That should look better on really large monitors. 
Already set the Hero Slider background to #252531.
Done - Need high res versions of the hero images. (I'll put them in Basecamp) 

# Categorization (Suppliers, Enterprise, Supply Chain)

DONE - For index2 in the categorisation section the border-left for the supplier box does not always render. Consider putting the padding on categorization-pic element level.
Using margin on categorization-pic, and set categorisation list with a fixed width "341px"

Note: When working with floated elements it's not a good idea to mix percentage width elements with fixed pixel margin, border & padding on the same level block element. I set the widths with a grid on the parent element. Then I set the fixed pixel margin, border & padding on child elements. I have found this to be a real help with responsive design layout.  

# How It Works

DONE - Lightbox js effect for how it works section not working. 
Add how it work section for index.html, with js effect for both navigation & button in slideshow.

# See what the media is saying about us 

DONE - All those logos need to be changed to image links. It's currently a background image.
Use high performance PNG logos, with the real link from original site.

# Customs Data 

DONE - Index 1 - Need background image parallax effect.
Already add to Index 1, but a little strange to put it with the herotestimonial one.
DONE - Index 2 - Need a bit more parallax effect, too subtle.
Make the parallax more obvious by reduce Height

# Meet Cedric Video

DONE - The video provider selection icons are not there. 
Add video selection buttons
DONE - The javascript for opening the video in a modal is also not there.   
Add javascript control the video selection buttons.

# Product Directory

Fixed - but should still change to grid - The four directory boxes at the bottom are not inline on firefox. "Browse Customs Data" is on the next line. This is another area where you might use a grid for the layout and set padding on a child element.
